an4.270:1.1: …pe… Attana ca samphappalapi hoti, paranca samphappalape samadapeti, samphappalape ca samanunno hoti, samphappalapassa ca vannam bhasati—imehi …pe….
an4.270:2.1: Attana ca samphappalapa pativirato hoti, paranca samphappalapa veramaniya samadapeti, samphappalapa veramaniya ca samanunno hoti, samphappalapa veramaniya ca vannam bhasati—imehi kho, bhikkhave …pe….
